title: Proximity Sensor is not working properly
content:
So my proximity sensor does not seem to be working properly. Any time I try to call someone the screen goes completely black, no matter whether my face is close to the phone or not. I cannot hang up since the screen continuously stays black and I can not exit this black screen in any way. Hence I always have to wait for the other person to hang up, and if I get voicemail I cannot hang up or type in any keys and I just have to wait it out. This is getting very annoying.

I thought potentially my screen protector was to blame and that's why I haven't posted anything in this help center until now. However today I took my screen protector off and the proximity sensor still doesn't seem to work.

I have tried everything, from rebooting my phone, seeing if it works in safe mode, cleaning my phone. Nothing seems to work. I downloaded AndroSensor and the value of my proximity sensor is always 0, which should only happen when my face is close by.

How can I fix this issue? Thanks in advance.
